snippet: In an age of e-books the Metropolitan Museum has published an old-fashioned guide, highlighting 600 of its major works and serving as a fine introduction to 6,000 years of art.
abstract: Ken Johnson Critic's Notebook on The Metropolitan Museum of Art Guide, the first new edition of the museum's guide book in almost 30 years.
lead_paragraph: In an age of e-books the Metropolitan Museum has published an old-fashioned guide, highlighting 600 of its major works and serving as a fine introduction to 6,000 years of art.

headline.seo: Metropolitan Museum of Art’s New Guidebook
headline.main: A Vast Museum That You Can Carry
headline.print_headline: A Vast Museum That You Can Carry

keywords.value: The Metropolitan Museum of Art Guide (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works
